title: Obtain the Sinner
text: ...Who is it this time? Stop there, back off... I said back off!

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: I've gotten stronger? ...Oi, you. What have you done to me!

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Rabbit, for you. You help me improve, and I bring you meat.

title: Level Start
text: Stay close, something's up.

title: Win Battles
text: Extra meat for dinner! We made a deal.

title: Lose Battles
text: That doesn't count. One more round.

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Too late to run away, prey!

title: Die in Battles
text: Hmm...

title: Greeting
text: Ooh-eh? Ooh-eh-ee-ooh... Oh, it's you. Nothing, I'm just chatting with Pippy.

title: Conversation 1
text: Never slip up in the Rust, or... there will be trouble.

title: Conversation 2
text: Money... Tell me what it is? Why does everyone want it?

title: Conversation 3
text: Pippy is not my pet. It's my lunch. Too bad it's too fat, too greasy to eat.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Hey! What's that thing? It's... eating trash? I-it's coming at me! A robot vacâ€”what? M-make it go away!

title: Special Conversation 2
text: They used to call me a stray, one without a home. That's not me anymore.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I'll go wherever you go. If you leave without me, I'll go out and find you.

title: Full Compliance
text: You're different from other humans. How... I can't put it into words. It's a hunch.

title: Idle
text: Oi! Oi? You can doze off like that? ...Just like Pippy.

title: Annoyed
text: What are you doing?! I'm not a dog!

title: Special Attention
text: Why are you staring at me? What do you want!

title: Dispatch
text: You... You're not coming?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Here, the stuff.

title: Level Up
text: Boring.

title: Join Team
text: If I win, extra meat for dinner.

title: Attire Obtained
text: I didn't want to come... but Pippy loves it here. Emmm... Why do I need to change my clothes to play in the water?

title: Greeting
text: You want to play in the water, too? Here, take this horse with a horn. It can float.

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Oh-eh-ee-ooh-ee (Talking to Pippy)...Pippy says these colorful things look pretty.

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: I'm not playing with it. I'm washing it clean! ...So that I can eat it later.

title: Idle
text: Hmm... The water here is a lot better than the dirty Rust...

title: Annoyed
text: Hey, quit splashing around! Water's getting into my eyes!

title: Level Up
text: A water fight? I won't lose.

title: Special Attention
text: My pants got a bit wet, that's all. Why are you staring at me?
